sect1.title: Background to programing &gnum;
sect1.para: Aims of &gnum; and why working jointly makes sense.

Collaborative process: -start by submitting patches checkout/code/checkbuild/diff/send patch to Jody or list or gitlab
-graduate to git access

sect1.title: Collaboration with the &gnum; team
sect1.para: If you work with the team or separate, you'll want to interact. --coordinate --collaborate
